name: Platycake
description:
A dialogue based casual game developed during BRGD 2022 Fall Session.

A Platypus's grandmother would like a cake, and it's Platty's job to bake one for her. Explore the town to meet various animal NPCs, do favors for them to receive various tools and items, to get the 5 ingredients needed to bake the perfect cake.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows - Move

Space - Talk with NPCs

E - Throw bottom item

Q - Switch between items

F - FIsh at pond
